sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The SVGAlib package contains libvga and libvgagl libraries, dumpreg, mode3, restorefont, restorepalette, restoretextmode, savetextmode, textmode and svgakeymap.

sect3.title: libvga library
sect3.para: libvga is a low-level graphics library.

sect3.title: libvgagl library
sect3.para: libvgagl is a fast framebuffer-level graphics library based on libvga.

sect3.title: dumpreg
sect3.para: dumpreg dumps the state of the card as the svgalib chipset driver sees it.

sect3.title: restorefont
sect3.para: restorefont saves or restores the SVGA font for textmode.

sect3.title: restorepalette
sect3.para: restorepalette sets the color palette for textmode.

sect3.title: restoretextmode
sect3.para: restoretextmode saves or restores the SVGA registers for textmode.

sect3.title: savetextmode, textmode
sect3.para: savetextmode and textmode save or restore the complete SVGA status for textmode.
